extensionAttribute.displayName: ESET Endpoint Antivirus - Number of Realtime Cleaned Objects
extensionAttribute.description:
Written by Neil Martin - 2018-12-03
This Extension Attribute returns the total number of cleaned infected objects found by ESET's Realtime scanner.
Returns no value if ESET Antivirus is not installed.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac:
#!/bin/bash
esets_daemon="/Applications/ESET Endpoint Antivirus.app/Contents/MacOS/esets_daemon"
if [[ -e "$esets_daemon" ]]; then esetrtcln=$("$esets_daemon" --status | grep RTPStatistics | cut -d "=" -f 2 | cut -d "|" -f 2 | cut -d ":" -f 2) esetrtdel=$("$esets_daemon" --status | grep RTPStatistics | cut -d "=" -f 2 | cut -d "|" -f 3 | cut -d ":" -f 2) echo "<result>$(($esetrtcln + $esetrtdel))</result>" exit 0 else echo "<result>""</result>" fi
exit 0
